section.heading: Writ of waste; lease forfeited for waste and lessee to pay treble damages.
section.text: A man from henceforth shall have a writ of waste in the chancery against him that holdeth by law, or otherwise for term of life, or for term of years; and he which shall be attainted of waste, shall lease the thing that he hath wasted, and moreover shall recompense thrice so much as the waste shall be taxed at.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 13-292 deleted “, or in dower” following “for term of years”.
